Subject: Hot Rod, decked in black
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He came out of the CR. He was now mostly black with red, and very little
yellow. The mostly red, orange and yellow paturn was gone. He walked
right up to. Feline. He had been thinking about if she really loved him,
or was it all part of the plan. He just came out with it.
"So tell me, did we really have something, or was it just another
pleasure of your asignment? Oh, and what do you think, of my new paint
job?"
